tool_description:
Our API offers a secure and reliable encryption and decryption service utilizing the latest industry-standard cryptographic algorithms.

Our SHA256 endpoint provides an easy means to verify user passwords. It compares the user-entered password with the stored hash to ensure that only authorized users gain access to your services.

Our RSA endpoint generates a secure public-private key pair, allowing you to encrypt sensitive data before transmitting it over the network. This guarantees that ev...
name: securityAPI
title: securityAPI

api_list.name: base64 encrypt
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://securityapi1.p.rapidapi.com/base64/encrypt/{"msg":"hola"}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "securityapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://securityapi1.p.rapidapi.com/base64/encrypt/{data}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "securityapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: password checker
api_list.description:
check if password encripted 
Algo Suported:
MD4
MD5
SHA-1
SHA-224
SHA-256
SHA-384
SHA-512
SHA3-224
SHA3-256
SHA3-384
SHA3-512
RIPEMD-160
RIPEMD-320
HAS-160
Whirlpool
JSON: {"algo":"sha256","pass":hashed_password,"enter_pass":user password}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://securityapi1.p.rapidapi.com/pass/{"algo":"sha256","pass":"89e01536ac207279409d4de1e5253e01f4a1769e696db0d6062ca9b8f56767c8","enter_pass":"mypassword"}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "securityapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: hmac
api_list.description:
verify a hmac
JSON: {"algo": "hmac", "pass":hashed_password,"enter_pass":user password, "key": the_secret_key}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://securityapi1.p.rapidapi.com/pass/{"algo":"hmac","pass":"4a2f14768bd846d8ad35782fce5f2e82f86a60cbf1cf430eab64d7888c76e2ba","enter_pass":"","key":"06ab245b7abff38202efd8db61hi419d6b3d2454cdeed0079a93291bdc67103512"}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "securityapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

api_list.name: get rsa keys

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: the output with be with out the \\\\n special chars

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://securityapi1.p.rapidapi.com/rsa/key/format=true"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "securityapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
